title: Caravan Camp
provenance_text:
Peter Lanyon [1918-1964], Cornwall, England; his wife, Sheila Lanyon, Newlyn, Penzance, Cornwall, England until September 22, 1981; purchased by Mr. and Mrs. Edward Haskell [1920-1988], Pittsburgh, PA, September 22, 1981 until June 23, 1988 [1]; Jane (Mrs. Edward) Haskell [1923-2013], June 23, 1988 until May 28, 2013; partial gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA in December 2005 and remainder bequest in September 2013.

[1]. See curatorial file for hand-written receipt for the work ($1266.67), dated September 22, 1981, signed by S. M. Lanyon and also follow-up letter to the Haskells from Sheila Lanyon.
